content: I will be working this afternoon on aligning the test plan that I drafted with what @Reece Adamson has automated into inferno. Comments welcome.
@Reece Adamson do you have a way to export something that looks like a test plan, procedure? TestScript? Cucumber? CSV? narrative? something else ?
I can manually read the test steps detail in the inferno.. just wondering how to better automate
what can we do short-term (today and friday), vs what are we going to do next weeks / months
sounds better than me hand editing the saner test plan markdown given copy-paste from your UI... I hope that we can do better in the coming months
I am trying to align your test step identifiers with the content in the test plan... so that it is clear what has a test and what a human must do
Can I get a link to the current test plan for the presentation?
Keith accepted my pull request, but didn't hook it to anything. So I don't think you can navigate to it. when I make my next pull request I will add links. I think from a new volume XXIII
